description:
Class News
Bunji and his friends, the four stupid boys, are in charge of creating a class newsletter. Mom gives the advice "you can`t do the same things as others" and "gather it with your feet" so the four of them walk down the street...
Present?
In this world, there are some things that boys do that girls don`t understand. This story starts  when Fumi gets a monster drawing from Jo who only plays scissors...
Early Afternoon
One early afternoon, Dad is sitting on a bench and a salaryman slowly sits down. On one side is Dad, who is wearing shorts and sandals, while on the other hand the salaryman is wearing a suit. There is a weird atmosphere, but...
Life... What Is It?
Mom is sick with a cold. Looking for someone to look after her, she talks to Bunji since he is home, but he asks "What is life?" and "Why do I have to study everyday?" He brings his thoughts to Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Class News / Present? / Early Afternoon / Life... What is it?
学級新聞 / プレゼント? / 昼下がり / 人生...って?
